content.raw:
I've been testing the pr2.world:

1. `gazebo worlds/pr2.world --verbose` 

and repeatedly doing:

1. `./pub_open_world worlds/pr2.world` in a separate terminal

the first time the pr2.world is opened I see two laser scan topics:

~~~
$ gz topic -l | grep scan
/gazebo/default/pr2/base_footprint/base_laser/scan
/gazebo/default/pr2/laser_tilt_mount_link/laser_tilt/scan
~~~

once I execute `pub_open_world`, one topic is lost

~~~
$ gz topic -l | grep scan
/gazebo/default/pr2/base_footprint/base_laser/scan
~~~

and ocassionally I get a crash on the first `pub_open_world` cmd (if it works the first time then it's likely to work again):

~~~
[Msg] Opening world file [worlds/pr2.world]
[Err] [ODEMultiRayShape.cc:73] EXCEPTION: Invalid physics engine. Must use ODE.

terminate called after throwing an instance of 'gazebo::common::Exception'
[Err] [ConnectionManager.cc:605] ConnectionManager is not initialized
~~~
content.html:
I've been testing the pr2.world:

  1. gazebo worlds/pr2.world --verbose

and repeatedly doing:

  1. ./pub_open_world worlds/pr2.world in a separate terminal

the first time the pr2.world is opened I see two laser scan topics:

$ gz topic -l | grep scan
/gazebo/default/pr2/base_footprint/base_laser/scan
/gazebo/default/pr2/laser_tilt_mount_link/laser_tilt/scan

once I execute pub_open_world, one topic is lost

$ gz topic -l | grep scan
/gazebo/default/pr2/base_footprint/base_laser/scan

and ocassionally I get a crash on the first pub_open_world cmd (if it works the first time then it's likely to work again):

[Msg] Opening world file [worlds/pr2.world]
[Err] [ODEMultiRayShape.cc:73] EXCEPTION: Invalid physics engine. Must use ODE.

terminate called after throwing an instance of 'gazebo::common::Exception'
[Err] [ConnectionManager.cc:605] ConnectionManager is not initialized
